NANOBANANA.ToolHint: Drag to select a region of the map to edit with AI
NANOBANANA.SettingsApiKeyHint: Your Google Generative AI API key (get one at https://aistudio.google.com/apikey)
NANOBANANA.SettingsModelHint: Select the Google AI model to use for image generation
NANOBANANA.DialogPromptPlaceholder: Describe how you want to modify this area...
NANOBANANA.ErrorNoApi: Google AI API Key is not configured. Please set it in Module Settings.
NANOBANANA.ErrorApiFailed: Failed to communicate with Google AI API: {error}
NANOBANANA.ErrorCaptureFailed: Failed to capture the selected region.
NANOBANANA.FlattenConfirm: This will capture the entire map, replace the background image, and remove all {count} tile(s). This cannot be undone. Continue?
NANOBANANA.PortraitNoImage: This character has no portrait image to edit.
NANOBANANA.PortraitPromptPlaceholder: Describe how you want to modify this portrait...
NANOBANANA.TokenNoImage: This character has no token image to edit.
NANOBANANA.TokenPromptPlaceholder: Describe how you want to modify this token...
NANOBANANA.TokenGenExamplesLabel: Token Style Examples (select to use as reference)
NANOBANANA.TokenGenNoExamples: No token examples found. Place example token images in the nanobanana-map-editor/token-examples/ folder. You can also add a .txt file with the same name for each example to include a style prompt.
NANOBANANA.TokenGenPromptPlaceholder: Describe the token style you want to generate...
NANOBANANA.TokenGenDefaultPrompt: Generate a character token from this portrait image. Use the provided example tokens as style references. The token should be circular, with a clear character depiction suitable for use as a virtual tabletop token.
